body:
Because I'm bored, I thought I might ask this question: besides yourself, whose profile pictures/backgrounds really pop out to you?
My personal faves:

Picture: Snoozin. I laugh everytime.

Background: Probably Refuse's. She actually kinda inspired mine.

title: Favorite profile pics/backgrounds?

replies.body: Picture: Mine if my stupid email would register.
replies.body_tagged: Picture: Mine if my stupid email would register.

replies.body:
Picture: Brit's picture is adorable, so I guess hers. :p

Background: Can I choose mine? Trunks is 10/10 \(^-^)/ If I can't, Pelly's background is quite nice, so I'll go with his.

EDIT: dwdw I was joking about asking if I could choose mine ;)
replies.body_tagged:
Picture: Brit's picture is adorable, so I guess hers. :p

Background: Can I choose mine? Trunks is 10/10 \(^-^)/ If I can't, Pelly's background is quite nice, so I'll go with his.

replies.body:
Ok, keep in mind I said "…Besides yourself…".

In other words, don't vote for your own.
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: It's definitely between Skyadia's, ParaSpider's and Spartemex's for me-- they're all so damn adorable :3
